outline:
1. to stretch oneself out, lie down, lie stretched out
    1. (Qal) to lie down, lie
    2. (Hiphil) to cause to lie down
      1. laying (stones)
kjv_def: crouch (down), fall down, make a fold, lay, (cause to, make to) lie (down), make to rest, sit.
strongs_def: to crouch (on all four legs folded, like a recumbent animal); be implication, to recline, repose, brood, lurk, imbed
